scripts.infra:bootstrap: pnpm infra:env && pnpm infra:pubsub-up && sleep 2 && pnpm infra:pubsub-setup && pnpm infra:supabase-start
scripts.check: pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm test
scripts.conductor:run: concurrently -n web,be,ai "cd apps/web && PORT=${CONDUCTOR_WEB_PORT:-3000} API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:${CONDUCTOR_BE_PORT:-8080}/v1 NEXT_PUBLIC_FE_BASE_URL=http://localhost:${CONDUCTOR_WEB_PORT:-3000} pnpm dev" "cd apps/backend && PORT=${CONDUCTOR_BE_PORT:-8080} API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:${CONDUCTOR_BE_PORT:-8080} PYTHON_SERVICE_BASE_URL=http://localhost:${CONDUCTOR_AI_PORT:-8000} pnpm dev" "cd apps/ai && PORT=${CONDUCTOR_AI_PORT:-8000} poetry run start"
